title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Child Care Act 1991 (Early
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Child Care Act 1991 (Early 

Years Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 

1 September 2021. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 september 2021 interpretation

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)
heading: In these Regulations:
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations: 

“Principal Regulations” means the Child Care Act 1991 (Early Years Services) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 221 of 2016) as amended by the Child Care Act 1991 
(Early Years Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 632 of 2016). 

Amendment of Regulation 1 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean child care act 1991 (early year services) regulation 2016 (s.i no 221 2016) amended child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2016 (s.i no 632 2016) amendment regulation 1 principal regulation

title: of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 408 of 2020)
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended –
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended – 

Regulation 9 of the Child Care Act 1991 (Early Years Services) Regulations (S.I. 
No. 221 of 2016) is amended— 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 9 paragraph (4), by the substitution of “paragraphs 
(5), (6), (6A) and (6B)” for “paragraphs (5), (6) and (6A)”, and 

in Regulation 9, by the insertion of the following Paragraph after 
Paragraph (6A): 

“(6B) Furthermore, Paragraph (4) shall not apply before 1 
September 2023 to a person who- 

(a) was previously exempted under Paragraph 6, 

(b) on 1 September 2021 is employed in a prescribed 
early years service and is working directly with 
children, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [401] 3 

(c) 

has signed a declaration to the effect that he or she 
will obtain a qualification as set out in Paragraph 4, 

or, if a childminder, has signed a declaration to the 
effect that he or she will obtain a qualification as set 
out in any future Regulations made by the Minister, 

and 

(d) 

is in possession of a letter from the Minister 
confirming that paragraph (4) shall not apply to him 
or her before that date.” 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration, and Youth, 

29 July, 2021. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
 Integration and Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [401]
